name: Konohana Sakuya
skill: Recovers 1335/1635 HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP. Targets receive 67%/82% less DMG for a limited time.
ability: Slightly increases battle reward drop rate

additional_data.description: Goddess of childbirth and rearing from Japanese folklore, and younger sister of Princess Iwanaga. A picture of dignity and grace, this classy lady's abundant charm inspires seething jealousy in her elder sister, who harbors a bitter, one-sided grudge against her younger sibling. Desperate to salvage their relationship, Sakuya is currently accepting ideas on how to win her mean sister's affections.

main: "How can I get my sister to like me?"
summon: "Forgive my forthrightness, but... I look forward to working with you."
limit_break: "Do you think this might make my sister forgive me...?"
